articles.description: Thousands will pay their respects to Wales rugby hero Phil Bennett today at a memorial and funeral service
articles.content:
Wales rugby legend Phil Bennett was laid to rest today after thousands attended a memorial service in his honour.

articles.title: Chelsea 'inform HMRC and the FA of an issue with the club's tax affairs before the recent takeover' - Daily Mail

articles.content:
